admin.content: Organize and manage your agents by assigning them to specific branches or local stores, including internal departments.

admin.title: üö´ Offline message
admin.content: Send a message to the user when their first message is sent outside of scheduled office hours or all agents are offline. Text formatting and merge fields are supported.

admin.title: ü§ñ Interactive routing
admin.content:
This function assigns conversations based on the customer's choice. To use it, fill in the fields with the option to be selected, whether it's a number or a word. Then, set a pre-defined automatic response and enter the number of the department to which you want to assign the incoming conversation.

Optionally, you can leave the department assignment field blank, and the router will work as an informational chatbot. Please note that it does not assign conversations directly to agents, but exclusively to departments so that an available agent can take the conversation.

By default, it includes 5 options, but we can add more if necessary.

* Important: to assign queries directly to an agent, use the Automatic routing option.

admin.title: ‚û°Ô∏è Automatic routing
admin.content: It assigns conversations randomly the first time and then to the agent with the least open conversations for a balanced workload. Additionally, conversations are private, guaranteeing customer confidentiality. Important: this function only works for agents and does not assign to departments. If you need to assign to departments, use Interactive routing.

admin.title: ü§´ Hide conversations of other agents
admin.content: Prevent agents from viewing conversations assigned to other agents. This setting is automatically enabled if routing is active.

admin.title: üìú Saved replies
admin.content: Add and manage saved replies that can be used by agents in the chat editor. Saved replies can be printed by typing # followed by the reply name plus space.

admin.title: üö¶ Rate and review question
admin.content:
This function is activated by writing [rating] in the message to be sent or by using the üëç button. The message received by the customer can be:


How would you rate the service received from agent {agent_name}?

1. Positive, it was very helpful.
2. Negative.

This way, the customer selects an option, and the rating will appear in the reports section as a positive or negative rating.

admin.title: üí¨ Close message
admin.content: This function allows an automatic message to be sent to the user when an agent archives a conversation. When the conversation is archived, the function triggers the message to be sent to the user, which could include a polite thank you note or any other custom message that the organization wishes to convey. This feature helps to maintain good communication and relationship with customers, even after a conversation has ended, and it can be useful for providing additional information or offering further assistance if needed.
